member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.Attempt
member.summary: The number of times this delivery has been attempted.

member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.Categories
member.summary: The categories assigned to the message.

member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.EmailAddress
member.summary: The Email address of the intended recipient.

member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.EventName
member.summary: Applies to all message types.

member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.IpAddress
member.summary: The IP Address where the event originated.

member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.Reason
member.summary: Bounce or Drop reason from MTA
member.remarks: Applies to only the Bounce and Drop events.

member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.Response
member.summary: Full reponse from MTA.
member.remarks: Applies to only the Deferred and Delivered events.

member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.SendGridId
member.summary: A unique id for the event, assigned by SendGrid. This is a 23 byte string.

member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.SmtpId
member.summary: An id attached to the message by the originating system.
member.remarks: Applies to all message types. Optional.

member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.Status
member.summary: 3 digit status code.
member.remarks: Applies to only the Bounce event.

member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.TimeStamp
member.summary: The Unix Time that the event occurred.

member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.Type
member.summary: Bounce/Blocked/Expired
member.remarks: Applies to only the Bounce event.

member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.UniqueArguments
member.summary: A set of unique arguments sent through the SMTP API.

member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.Url
member.summary: The URL that was clicked.
member.remarks: Applies to only the Click event.

member.name: P:SendGrid.EventData.UserAgent
member.summary: The user agent responsible for the event

member.name: M:SendGrid.IMail.EnableSpamCheck(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Provides notification when emails are detected that exceed a predefined spam threshold.
member.param: Emails with a SpamAssassin score over this substitutionValues will be considered spam and not be delivered.
SendGrid will send an HTTP POST request to this url when a message is detected as spam

member.name: M:SendGrid.IMail.EnableUnsubscribe(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows SendGrid to manage unsubscribes and ensure these users don't get future emails from the sender
member.param: string for the plain text email body showing what you want the message to look like.
string for the HTML email body showing what you want the message to look like.

member.name: M:SendGrid.IMail.EnableUnsubscribe(System.String)
member.summary: Allows SendGrid to manage unsubscribes and ensure these users don't get future emails from the sender
member.param: Tag in the message body to be replaced with the unsubscribe link and message

member.summary: Re-writes links to integrate with Google Analytics
member.param: Name of the referrer source (e.g. Google, SomeDomain.com, NewsletterA)

Identify paid keywords
Use to differentiate ads

member.summary: Automatically sends a blind carbon copy to an address for every e-mail sent, without adding that address to the header.
